title: Auto Service
working_hours: 7 days a week, from 10 AM to 7 PM
save_up_to: Save up to 7% on works and spare parts with a loyalty card
cooling_system: on all cooling system works, thermostats, pumps, radiators and antifreeze
automatic_transmission: Automatic transmission repair, but we can replace the entire gearbox or change the oil
show_and_tell: We can always show and explain what's happening with your car.
cleanliness: We maintain cleanliness, using seat covers, floor mats, and more.
by_appointment: We work by appointment, respecting your and our time.
parts_ordering: We can compile a list, find or order spare parts and oils.
modern_software: We use modern software for auto services and special tools.
official_work: We work officially and provide all necessary documents.
contact_description: Write to us on social networks or call by phone.
contact_recommendation: We recommend specifying the make, model, year and VIN code right away.
consultation_description: You come to our service, the master conducts an inspection of the car and agrees with you on the cost of work and terms.
parts_description: We can select, find and order necessary spare parts.
parts_details: 100% prepayment. When ordering, terms are 10-14 days. Installation of your spare parts is also available.
repair_description: Our masters perform all necessary types of work.
repair_guarantee: Warranty up to 6 months, depending on the type of repair.
ready_description: We contact you when the work is coming to an end. Quality control is performed. You pick up the car.
working_schedule: Working hours: Mon-Sun from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM
diagnostics_description: You come to our service, the master inspects the car and agrees with you on the cost of work and deadlines.
parts_payment: 100% prepayment. Order lead time 10-14 days. Installation of your parts is also available.
warranty: Warranty up to 6 months, depending on the type of repair.
completion_description: We contact you when the work is coming to an end. Quality control is performed. You pick up the car.
